:::Defection:::"You see Onyx, this is my Good friend and follower Datastreak 
one of the most intelligent bots in the Universe! He has brought me my flag 
ship which I will leave in command to you. Another one of my followers is 
Herald Angle, He is a former Voc Emissary, He is a curtail asset to my plans, 
but he goes into stasis lock every other day. What we are doing Onyx is 
destroying the Arc, Those stupid gods thought they would do it, but they will 
be unpleasantly defeated son we will be heading for the arc and we will 
kill off all of the Heroes to be Making it impossible for the Maximals and 
predicons to exist. Once They are out of the picture we will Destroy the 
Alliance and all the minor factions. And at last we will rule this Earth! The 
biggest problem we will have is getting  rid of those pesky Gardeins, that's 
wear HeraldAngle comes in, he will be able to kill the Gardeins off wile you 
take care of the other bots that try and stop me wile Datastreak and I go and 
destroy the Autobots and Desepticons! Then we will rule!!!!"
